title: NOMI Beauty
seo_title: Nomi Beauty WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Nomi Beauty WestHouse Hotel New York
contents: WestHouse is pleased to partner with NOMI Beauty, the premier in-room hair and makeup service provider. NOMI Beauty is your go-to beauty solution while traveling, making it effortless to get ready for your important business meeting, social event, or exciting night out in the city. Their elite team of expertly-trained hair stylists and makeup artists are hand-picked and guarantee consistent, high quality results.
shortdescrp: Enjoy hair and makeup in the comfort of your room
